message_description: Minor delays due to bridge strike
detail: Service update from the Piccadilly line control room there are minor delays on the Piccadilly line due to a car hitting a bridge

message_description: Suspension due to weather on the westbound
detail: Service update from the Piccadilly line control room the westbound Piccadilly line is suspended due to earlier adverse weather conditions

message_description: Trains held  eastbound due to security alert
detail: Service update from the Piccadilly line control room the eastbound Piccadilly line trains are currently being held in platforms due to a security alert outside the station

message_description: Running a special service due to a derailment
detail: Service update from the Piccadilly line control room the Piccadilly line has a special service due to a derailment

message_description: Part Suspended due to network rail
detail: Service update from the Piccadilly line control room the Piccadilly line is partially suspended due to Network Rail
Service update from the Piccadilly line control room the Piccadilly line has larger gaps between trains than usual due to Network Rail

message_description: There is a special service due to a derailment
detail: Service update from the Piccadilly line control room the Piccadilly line has a special service due to a derailment

message_description: The station is closed because of a bus
detail: Service update from the Piccadilly line control room is closed due to a bus hitting a bridge
